tasks.title: Run and Test the BizGenciz Project
tasks.description: Execute the BizGenciz project and verify its functionality, addressing any errors that may arise during testing. The project has been successfully run and is ready for testing.
tasks.details: 1. Set up the development environment by ensuring all necessary dependencies and configurations are in place. 2. Clone the BizGenciz repository from the version control system. 3. Build the project using the appropriate build tools (e.g., npm, Maven, etc.). 4. Run the application locally to ensure it starts without errors. 5. Perform functional testing by navigating through the application and checking all features. 6. Document any errors or issues encountered during testing. 7. If errors are found, debug the code and apply necessary fixes. 8. Re-run the tests to confirm that the fixes resolve the issues and that no new issues have been introduced. 9. Test the application using the following access links: Home Page: http://localhost:3001, Groups Page: http://localhost:3001/gruplar, Health Check: http://localhost:3001/api/health, Admin Panel: http://localhost:3001/panel.
tasks.testStrategy: 1. Verify that the application starts successfully without any runtime errors. 2. Execute a series of test cases covering all major functionalities of the application. 3. Check the application logs for any warnings or errors during execution. 4. Ensure that all features work as intended and match the project specifications. 5. Document the results of the tests, including any issues found and their resolutions. 6. Confirm that the CSS optimization is active and all components are loading correctly.

subtasks.title: Debug the code and apply necessary fixes
